components.name: Frontend
components.description: User interface for interacting with the inference system

components.name: Backend
components.description: Handles business logic, request routing, and coordination between components

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores model configurations, inference results, and metadata

components.name: Model Service
components.description: Manages machine learning model deployment and inference execution

data_flows.description: User input and UI interactions are routed to backend processing
Request payloads are sent to the model service for inference execution
Inference results and model metadata are persisted to the database

trust_boundaries.name: Public Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Components exposed to external users (frontend, public API endpoints)

trust_boundaries.name: Internal Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Secure internal components handling sensitive operations
